metadata.title: CVE-2024-56374 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Potential denial-of-service vulnerability in IPv6 validation

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-56374` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.16').
